attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AUDIT ALL LOCAL AUTHORITIES TO FIND OUT HOW MUCH OF PUBLIC FUNDS ARE BEING WASTED ON FREELOADERS,POOR SERVICES (IE ROADS) AND CONTRACTORS.I HAVE SEEN MANY INSTANCES OF THIS FROM MY LOCAL COUNCIL (WAVERLEY BOROUGH).AN EXAMPLE OF THIS IS:MOVING A DRUG ABUSING,ALCOHOLIC DOSSER ON MORE THAN THREE OCCASIONS,PROVIDING HIM WITH TAXIS ON A REGULAR BASIS,PROVIDING A COMPANY TO MOVE HIM AND ALLOWING HIM TO DISTURB WORKING PEOPLE FOR LONG PERIODS OF TIME IN AN ANTI SOCIAL MANNER BUT INSTEAD OF DEALING WITH THE COMPLAINTS ABOUT HIM MOVING HIM TO A BETTER AREA AT THE EXPENSE OF THE TAXPAYERS.
REMOVE THE OFFENDERS OF PUBLIC FUND WASTAGE AND REPLACE THEM IMMEDIATELY.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
